source.f27d1e90:
df['year_and_month'] =  pd.to_numeric(df['year']).astype(str) + ' year '+ pd.to_numeric(df['month']).astype(str) + ' month'
df2 = df[['continent', 'new_cases', 'year_and_month']].groupby(['continent', 'year_and_month']).sum().reset_index()
df2

source.1c7a702f:
The statistics of the incidence of coronavirus for a certain period in different countries is given, recorded in the file covid-19cases.csv. Necessary:

1. Clean up the data by removing empty columns and uninformative lines (lines allocated for notes for Notes)
2. Determine the statistics of cases of infection in different parts of the world (column continent) for each month
3. Determine the correlation of each part of the world with the other.
4. Display the name of the part of the world that least correlates with others
